task:
BUILD COMPLETE FEELD PAYMENT SYSTEM - CRYPTO ON ARBITRUM

MISSION: Create the entire FEELD ecosystem for moving money point A to point B faster than any platform at 1% fee.

CORE ARCHITECTURE:
- Smart contracts on Arbitrum chain
- 1% transaction fee mechanism
- Safety Vault (20% cap protection)
- Growth Vault (unlimited upside potential)
- Lightning-fast settlement system
- User-friendly interfaces

DELIVERABLES REQUIRED:

1. SMART CONTRACTS (/contracts/):
   - FEELD.sol (main token contract)
   - PaymentProcessor.sol (core payment logic)
   - SafetyVault.sol (20% cap mechanism)
   - GrowthVault.sol (unlimited upside)
   - FeeDistribution.sol (1% fee handling)
   - LiquidityPool.sol (arbitrum liquidity)

2. BACKEND SERVICES (/backend/):
   - payment-api/ (REST API for transactions)
   - settlement-engine/ (fast processing)
   - vault-manager/ (safety/growth vault logic)
   - arbitrum-bridge/ (chain interaction)
   - monitoring/ (real-time tracking)

3. FRONTEND APPS (/frontend/):
   - web-app/ (main dashboard)
   - mobile-app/ (React Native)
   - merchant-portal/ (business integration)
   - admin-panel/ (system management)

4. INFRASTRUCTURE (/infra/):
   - docker-compose.yml (local dev)
   - k8s/ (production deployment)
   - monitoring/ (grafana/prometheus)
   - security/ (audit configs)

5. DOCUMENTATION (/docs/):
   - technical-spec.md
   - api-documentation.md
   - deployment-guide.md
   - security-audit.md
   - investor-pitch.md

TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS:
- Arbitrum L2 optimization
- Sub-second transaction confirmation
- Enterprise-grade security
- Scalable architecture
- Real-time fee distribution
- Vault management automation

BUILD EVERYTHING. Make it production-ready. Hugo needs this for his investor pitch.
